export const initialState=null;export const reducer=(state,action)=>{switch(action.type){case'USER':return action.payload;case'CLEAR':return null;case'UPDATE':// Handle the case where state is null (initial state) by ensuring it has a default structure
return{...state,followers:action.payload.followers,following:action.payload.following};case'UPDATEPIC':return{...state,pic:action.payload};default:return state;}};
